nodes.text: Gonda was a terrestrial planet located in the Outer Rim Territories, where smuggler Lando Calrissian nearly lost his droid companion L3-37 to a member of the Hutt species after making a bad bet in a game of sabacc. Gonda was included on a map in the book Traveler's Guide to Batuu, written by the historian Eloc Throno.
Gonda was first mentioned in the 2019 junior novel Lando's Luck, written by Justina Ireland.
